name: Rhino Smash
description:
Rhino Smash is a game made within unity To demonstrate my programming capabilities at photon a unity networked plugin for the first time and create a client-server game.

Metamorfight is a two-player or more online multiplayer game that has players pitted against each other in an arena. The player must shoot each other twice to pick up a point and reset the oponent. Upon reaching three kills the game is over and the first to reach three has won.

Features:

1) Players in this game can make an online room

2) Chat with other players

3) View a global leader board

4) Turn into cars for quick getaways

5) Shoot others to reset them

Additional info

Developed on Unity 2020.1.51f
Supported platforms: Windows PCs Player amount:
Requires Two players or more with a network connection
